verses.plain: The elders which are among you I exhort, who am also an elder, and a witness of the sufferings of Christ, and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed:

tokens.t: The elders which are among you I exhort, who am also an elder, and a witness of the sufferings of Christ, and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed:

verses.plain: Feed the flock of God which is among you, taking the oversight thereof, not by constraint, but willingly; not for filthy lucre, but of a ready mind;

tokens.t: Feed the flock of God which is among you, taking the oversight
, not by constraint, but willingly; not for filthy lucre, but of a ready mind;

verses.plain: Neither as being lords over God’s heritage, but being ensamples to the flock.

tokens.t: Neither as being lords over
heritage, but being ensamples to the flock.

verses.plain: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear, ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away.

tokens.t: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear, ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away.

verses.plain: Likewise, ye younger, submit yourselves unto the elder. Yea, all of you be subject one to another, and be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble.

tokens.t: Likewise, ye younger, submit yourselves unto the elder. Yea, all
be subject one to another, and be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble.

verses.plain: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:

tokens.t: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:

verses.plain: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

tokens.t: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

verses.plain: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour:

tokens.t: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour:

verses.plain: Whom resist stedfast in the faith, knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world.

tokens.t: Whom resist stedfast in the faith, knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world.

verses.plain: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.

tokens.t: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle

verses.plain: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.

tokens.t: To him
glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.

verses.plain: By Silvanus, a faithful brother unto you, as I suppose, I have written briefly, exhorting, and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand.

tokens.t: By Silvanus, a faithful brother unto you, as I suppose, I have written briefly, exhorting, and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand.

verses.plain: The church that is at Babylon, elected together with you, saluteth you; and so doth Marcus my son.

tokens.t: The
at Babylon, elected together with
, saluteth you; and
Marcus my son.

verses.plain: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity. Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus. Amen.

tokens.t: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity. Peace
with you all that are in Christ Jesus. Amen.
